title: Fruits of life
description: Fruits of life will be a workpiece measuring 230 x 60 x 60 cm. The figurines form the heart of the composition and are approximately 13x6x6 cm in size.
context: Fruits of life will be a workpiece measuring 230 x 60 x 60 cm. The figurines form the heart of the composition and are approximately 13x6x6 cm in size. Currently, the figurines include: The Water Bearer (2012), The Scale (2013), Mother and Child (2018), The Fisherman (2019), The Family (2021), Comforting (2023)
